http://www.milanohio.com/ |footnotes = }} 'Milan' (pronounced ) is a village in
Erie and Huron counties in the U.S. state of Ohio. The population was 1,367 at
the 2010 census.

The Erie County portion of Milan is part of the Sandusky Metropolitan
Statistical Area, while the Huron County portion is part of the Norwalk
Micropolitan Statistical Area.
